parts.text: Here are some localization strings I'm working with in JSON format. The `welcome_message` has placeholders.

```json
{
  "welcome_message": "Welcome back, {name}! You have {count} new notifications.",
  "btn_cancel": "Cancel",
  "error_timeout": "The connection timed out. Please try again later."
}
```
